title: [K-12] Culturally Contextualized Computing Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and understanding of social diversity
context.additional_context: A VR simulation environment that integrates computing concepts and social values by reflecting learners' cultural backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can design problem-solving scenarios integrating cultural elements and computing concepts in a VR environment.
Learners can explain an algorithm design process reflecting the cultural context of the local community.
Learners can revise computing activity plans based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
